title: Lace & Lies
description: Alexandra Levy has just started her job as an admin assistant for C.J. Inc. in New York City.Her first day on the job, she realizes she has the hots for the C.E.O., Chad Johnson.He is just as, if not more, attracted to her and doesn’t shy away from letting it be known to her.Are they able to control their lust for each other? Or do they let it control them…
author: Nina Lavender
